text:
sun in malibu,
 up what is that,
 one cloud near the sun

songs on radio,
songs on plastic discs,
songs in my earbuds?

icicles on roofs,
hot coco on window sills?
winter once again

meow meow meow meow meowwww,
i am a kitten,
i want to play fetch

I read this book,
it's rather odd now
let us read it now
